checks.msg: AppArmor annotation missing. The annotation 'container.apparmor.security.beta.kubernetes.io/ibm-kerify' should be added.

Capability "AUDIT_WRITE" added. It should be removed from the capability add list. If you need this capability, add an override label such as 'container.kubeaudit.io/ibm-kerify.allow-capability-audit-write: SomeReason'.

runAsUser is set to UID 0 (root user) in the container SecurityContext. Either set it to a value > 0 or remove it and set runAsNonRoot to true.
readOnlyRootFilesystem is set to 'false' in container SecurityContext. It should be set to 'true'.
Pod Seccomp profile is missing. Seccomp profile should be added to the pod SecurityContext.
